define.comment: Main parameters - this is for the more realistic June 2022 design

detector.name: OuterSiBarrel
detector.comment: Layers composed of many arrayed modules

layer.comment: phi0 : Starting phi of first module. phi_tilt : Phi tilt of a module. rc : Radius of the module center. nphi : Number of modules in phi. rphi_dr : The delta radius of every other module. z0 : Z position of first module in phi. nz : Number of modules to place in z. dr : Radial displacement parameter, of every other module.

readout.name: SiBarrelHits
readout.comment: bitfieldsizes for indexing sensors and modules, max values are 2 exp bitfieldsize
